page.title: 09Warsop Health Centre.
page.content: Our{Health Centre}provides many {services}to the people of Warsop from babyhood through adulthood.They can provide services for all kinds of purposes,for example,taking stitches out,plastering a leg up and looking after babies,children and old people. At the Health Centre there are{30 employees.These include 4 resident and 2 visiting doctors,1 school and 6 district nurses,3 health visitors,a midwife,a food sales clerk,6 receptionists and an administrator and her assistant. The smooth running of the Health Centre is dependant on the administrator and the receptionists. The Centre has been open for 11 years.It is visited on average by over {600}people a week.
